ygData.subject: Re: Exploit ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just an FYI.  I ve been hunting Innothule swamp lately, and resting in S. Ro. Last night there was a guide who never left S. Ro, and this morning there was a
ygData.messageBody:
Just an FYI. I've been hunting Innothule swamp lately, and resting in S. Ro.
Last night there was a guide who never left S. Ro, and this morning there was a
GM (Forgot his name, but he was a level 50 Rogue) So if you are considering
using the hill, be careful of who is around.

Malkin
Fennin Ro
